me.normanmaurer.niosmtp

Interface SMTPMessage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SMTPByteArrayMessage, SMTPByteArrayMessageImpl, SMTPMessageImpl

    public interface SMTPMessage
    The SMTPMessage implementations offer methods to get the message content.
    Author:
    Norman Maurer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InputStream get7bit()
      This method is getting called if the SMTP-Server does not support the 8BITMIME extension.
      InputStream get8Bit()
      This method is getting called if the SMTP-Server supports the 8BITMIME extension.

    • Method Detail

      • get7bit

        InputStream get7bit()
                    throws IOException
        This method is getting called if the SMTP-Server does not support the 8BITMIME extension.

        This method MAY return the same InputStream on every call, so it should only be used to consume the stream once.
        Returns:
        7bit
        Throws:
        IOException

      • get8Bit

        InputStream get8Bit()
                    throws IOException
        This method is getting called if the SMTP-Server supports the 8BITMIME extension.

        This method MAY return the same InputStream on every call, so it should only be used to consume the stream once.

        The returned InputStream is not expected to be "raw content" . It cannot include "null" bytes and must be composed of "lines" separated by CRLF and not longer than 998 bytes.
        Returns:
        convertedMsg
        Throws:
        IOException
